text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Goku’s body. Draw his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of it.
Add guidelines for the character’s arms, legs and facial features.
Outline his hands, trousers and ears. Define the place for his nose, eyebrows and belt.
Sketch Goku’s arms, hands, boots, hair (in general), eyes and the collar of his tunic.
Draw the clothes and hair. Draw tucks on the trousers and the belt.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Goku from Dragon Ball Z, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the floor. Erase all guidelines.
